CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get in Touch with Cricket Connect
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Have questions or feedback? We're here to help you stay on top of your cricket game!
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Join thousands of cricket enthusiasts in enhancing their skills, tracking stats, and connecting with fellow players.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Get real-time updates on all cricket matches with ball-by-ball commentary and instant score updates.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Access comprehensive stats for all players, including batting averages, bowling figures, and career highlights.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Stay informed with up-to-date rankings for all international and domestic cricket teams across formats.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Utilize our AI-powered prediction tool to forecast match outcomes based on team form and historical data.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Watch key moments from matches with our curated video highlights, including boundaries, wickets, and spectacular catches.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Create your dream team and compete with friends in our integrated fantasy cricket league with daily and seasonal prizes.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Your questions about our cricket app, answered
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What features does the Cricket Companion app offer?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app provides live scores, player statistics, match schedules, team rankings, and interactive cricket trivia.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Can I use the app to follow international and domestic cricket matches?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes, Cricket Companion covers major international tournaments, bilateral series, and domestic leagues from around the world.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Is there a feature for fantasy cricket in the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Currently, we don't offer fantasy cricket, but we're considering adding this feature in future updates based on user demand.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How often is the app updated with new information?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We update our app in real-time during live matches, and daily for news, rankings, and other cricket-related content.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is the Cricket Companion app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: The basic version is free, with an option to upgrade to a premium version for additional features like ad-free experience and exclusive content.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What features does the cricket app offer?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our cricket app provides live scores, player statistics, match schedules, team rankings, and in-depth analysis of games. You can also create custom alerts for your favorite teams and players.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Can I watch live matches on the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: While we don't stream full matches, we offer ball-by-ball commentary and live updates. For select tournaments, we may provide short video highlights of key moments.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Is the app free to use?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, the basic version of our app is free to download and use. We also offer a premium version with additional features such as ad-free experience, exclusive content, and advanced statistics.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Which cricket formats does the app cover?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Our app covers all major cricket formats including Test matches, One Day Internationals (ODIs), Twenty20 internationals, and popular domestic leagues like IPL, BBL, and County Championship.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: Professional-grade willow bat for powerful strokes

PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Padded gloves for protection and grip

PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Spiked shoes for optimal traction on the field

CTA_BODY: Step into the world of cricket with our innovative app. Stay updated, analyze matches, and connect with fellow fans.
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Discover how our app is transforming the cricket experience for fans and players alike
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has completely revolutionized how I follow cricket. Live scores, player stats, and expert analysis all in one place. It's a must-have for any true cricket fan!
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a coach, this app has been invaluable. The detailed performance analytics and training tips have helped me develop my team's skills like never before.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: From booking practice sessions to connecting with other players, this app has made managing my cricket life so much easier. It's like having a personal cricket assistant!
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Scores, Stats, and Strategies at Your Fingertips
